food_waste.title: Food Waste
food_waste.text1: Food waste; It means that the food produced turns into waste before it is consumed.
food_waste.text2: Üretim, işleme, satış veya tüketim süreçlerinde, gıda israfına yol açan pek çok sebep ortaya çıkabiliyor.
food_waste.text3: Many reasons that lead to food waste can arise in production, processing, sales or consumption processes.

food_waste_expanded.headline1: You too started fighting food waste
food_waste_expanded.headline3: The Impact of Food Waste on the Environment
food_waste_expanded.body1: Thank you for not leaving us alone on this road we set out to protect our planet!
food_waste_expanded.body2: According to the Food and Agricultural Organization of the United Nations (FAO) data, evaluating a meal as waste means emitting 2.5 kg of CO2 gas, in other words, charging smartphones 300 million times or burning 1130 tons of coal.
food_waste_expanded.body3: By 2050, the world population is expected to reach approximately 9.3 billion, and it is predicted that 60% more than today's food production will be needed to feed a population of this size.
food_waste_expanded.body4: 33% of the total food produced for consumption is wasted before it reaches the consumer.
food_waste_expanded.body5: Food waste costs around $ 750 billion a year.
food_waste_expanded.body6: The amount of food wasted every year in Turkey, 26 million tons. The cost of this waste is 214 billion TL.
food_waste_expanded.body7: 33% of the total food produced for consumption is wasted before it reaches the consumer.
food_waste_expanded.body8: The amount of water used in the production of wasted food (250 km3) is equivalent to the amount of water flowing from the Idil (Volga) River, Europe's longest river, and 3 times the volume of Lake Geneva, which is equal to 9 million people. daily water need can be met.

delete_account.title: Delete My Account
delete_account.text_2: Why do you want to delete your account? Please choose. Your information will be stored for 30 days. If you come back within 30 days, you can log into your account as if nothing had happened.
